job.title: Machine Learning Engineer - Push Notification
job.description: ltpgttiktok is the leading destination for shortform mobile video our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy tiktok has global offices including los angeles new york london paris berlin dubai mumbai singapore jakarta seoul and tokyoltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtwere looking for machine learning engineers to join our tiktok push notification team to support that growth and help us empower creators connect people and explore possibilitiesltstronggtltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtpush notification ltstronggtis one of the most important components for offering a great experience for tiktok users our team sends millions of notifications every day to help people find a personalized and relevant path back to tiktok our goal is to optimize for our users longterm satisfaction by sending the most relevant message to the right person at the right time with advanced machine learning and data analysisltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtour tiktok push notification teamltstronggt has a strong user focus and a dedication to technical excellence we aim to meet our users needs with reliable and highperforming platforms and services we are looking for strong software engineers who are excited to grow their business understanding build highly scalable and reliable software and partner across disciplines with global teams in pursuit of excellenceltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtresponsibilitiesltstronggtltpgtltpgt build industry leading recommendation system develop highly scalable classifiers and tools leveraging machine optimize push notification and production experienceltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtqualificationsltstronggtltpgtltpgt bachelors degree or higher degree in computer science or a related technical disciplineltpgtltpgt solid experience with data structures or algorithmsltpgtltpgt software development experience through hands on coding in a general purpose programming languageltpgtltpgt experience in one or more of the following areas machine learning recommendation systems data mining or other related areasltpgtltpgt strong communication and teamwork skillsltpgtltpgt passion about technologies and solving challenging problemsltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgttiktok is committed to creating an inclusive space where employees are valued for their skills experiences and unique perspectives our platform connects people from across the globe and so does our workplace at tiktok our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy to achieve that goal we are committed to
